description:
Ayumi thinks she’ll get a kiss from Haruo if she uses a magical book to make him the star of the Sports Festival. But when Yuri, Marin, and Maika get in the way, Haruo’s kiss might go to another girl!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le baiser de la victoire, vraiment ?
勝利のキスってマジですか?
